article_text:
PARIS—The French economy will keep expanding at a slow pace in the third quarter of the year, the Bank of France said Friday, while other statistics showed industrial production rising more than expected in June, but no improvement in public finances.

France's economy will grow 0.2% in the third quarter from the second, the Bank of France said in its monthly business climate survey. That follows the same quarterly expansion in the...
